summary: During the Meiji era, a gambler called Ocho takes revenge on three gangsters who killed her father, shelters a wanted anarchist and confronts a British spy.
cast: Reiko Ike|Akemi Negishi|Ryôko Ema|Yôko Hori|Naomi Oka|Rena Ichinose|Hachirô Oka|Shin'ichirô Hayashi|Rie Saotome|Jun Midorikawa|Yôko Mihara|Masataka Naruse|Takashi Shirai|Tsuyoshi Arita|Yuzuru Moritani|Seizaburô Kawazu|Hiroshi Nawa|Katsumasa Uchida|Taiji Tonoyama|Kinji Nakamura|Ryôta Minowada|Kuniomi Kitani|Tatsuo Endô|Masaharu Arikawa|Shunji Sasaki|Mark Darling|Masaru Shiga|Kyôko Tsukasa|Akira Ôizumi|Christina Lindberg|Mike Daneen
title: Furyô anego den: Inoshika Ochô
